tandem.title: Tandem
tandem.subtitle: Creating a Slack-like chat app
content: As part of my server-side web development class, I wrote the frontend and backend for a messaging app using React, Redux, Go, Node.js, MongoDB and Redis. I created three messaging clients that quarter, for a variety of projects, and wondered if they would be easier to make using React Native than React. I ended up contacting my professor, who agreed to do an independent study, and spent a quarter looking into React Native. An unpublished article with my thoughts can be found here.
